name: Sprint (EXPLODINGDRAGON)
description:
This game is a First-person speedrunning game, inspired by Karlson, Clustertruck, and SEUM: Speedrunners from Hell.

Note: The current build available for download on this page does not have any models yet, this is an early build I created as a submission for a university project, this is a continuation of this project, the next update will include models created by Rachael.

Credits Programming: Brandon Models: Rachael Playtesting: Holly Lucy Emily Lauren
